title.rendered: We Shall Overcome: The Seeger Sessions

<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>We Shall Overcome: The Seeger Sessions | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="A loose, exuberant throwdown of folk songs and traditionals popularized by Pete that can only be explained with commas: rock, folk, Dixieland, ragtime, gospel, French Quarter, honky-tonk, blues — in a word, American music." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/we-shall-overcome-the-seeger-sessions/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="We Shall Overcome: The Seeger Sessions" />
<meta property="og:description" content="A loose, exuberant throwdown of folk songs and traditionals popularized by Pete that can only be explained with commas: rock, folk, Dixieland, ragtime, gospel, French Quarter, honky-tonk, blues — in a word, American music. "Not music being written," Springsteen writes, "but music being made."" />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/we-shall-overcome-the-seeger-sessions/" />

"Not music being written," Springsteen writes, "but music being made."" />

yoast_head_json.title: We Shall Overcome: The Seeger Sessions | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: A loose, exuberant throwdown of folk songs and traditionals popularized by Pete that can only be explained with commas: rock, folk, Dixieland, ragtime, gospel, French Quarter, honky-tonk, blues — in a word, American music.

"Not music being written," Springsteen writes, "but music being made."
